title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Volanta - version 1.1.3
description:
In this video we will have a look at the new version of Volanta which has been released a few days ago. The developers have added some nice features including

- satellite images
- in-app SimBrief flightplan
- weather overlay

In addition to these features multiple fixes are implemented and a subscription option is available which adds new functionality.

If you already have Volanta installed it should automatically update if you don't have it yet you can download it from the site below:
https://volanta.app/
